attributes.action: Grant Immunity, and Honour the Whistleblower(s) who provided information on MPs expenses to the press.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the individual(s) who provided the daily telegraph with information on the mp's expense claims must not be prosecuted, but instead knighted in recognition of his unique contribution to improving the moral integrity of parliament.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
